website_summaries.verdict: Old schoolhouse look for a traditional décor.
pros: Can get creative with paint or add a name or other design
cons: Only available with a gold color hook, which can look dated

customer_reviews.title: My new one is great and I've now had it several months
customer_reviews.text: This toilet seat broke in half one month after I ordered it. I called Design House at Phone: 800-558-8700, and they sent me another one immediately free of charge. They verified that I bought it from Amazon and it was delivered within a week. My new one is great and I've now had it several months. If you get a bad one, just give them a call. The customer service rep was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice quality. A couple of issues though. First, if you use the uncluded drywall anchors the brackets are not going to be flat against wall. This creates a little wobble. It would have been nice for the back to have recesses. You could substitute a flatter anchor instead. I’d recommend a different anchor anyway, as the ones included are the cheapest variety. Second, two of the front screw hole recesses are too big for the included plugs. They will not stay in by friction. I suppose I’ll glue them in. I’m not too concerned with either, as this bar is at a utility sink.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only 2 1/2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a wonderful product. We received it on Aug 24, 2017, and on Dec 5, 2017, it cracked right down the middle. A very uncomfortable and slightly painful experience. When we first rec'd this seat I could see that there had been a break & a good repair. I don't know why I didn't return it then. It broke again after only 2 1/2 months use of use here. We aren't large people. My husband repaired w/gorilla glue & it held until last week. It's now 8/4/18 so it lasted less than a year but with 2 repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Graves

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging (product packaging
customer_reviews.text: Poor packaging (product packaging, not shipping packaging). You pretty much have to destroy the package in order to open it. So there is no test fitting, etc before you open it up. And the protruding pieces(that hold the roll in) is slighly too long. You have to squeeze your new roll of paper towel in order to push it in. You will leave indentation mark through the side of the entire roll, possibly crushing/mutilating the center tube in the process. Once it's on, it works fine though. There is enough clearance on all sides for the roll to rotate freely.
customer_reviews.author: Ying T. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother. Looks good but no quality control.
customer_reviews.text: No quality control here. The sides were not perpindicular to the base so a paper towel roll wouldn't fit. We took it apart to try and fix it and discovered that it was even worse when built but 'quality control' fudged it with some filler and glue to try and make it right. Unless you are handy and willing to rebuild, don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: spncdwg

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for an outhouse
customer_reviews.text: Some of the worst construction ever. We bought this because my husband wanted a solid oak seat like I have in my bathroom. Mine has a one piece seat and one piece lid. The description sounded like this was a good match. I overlooked some of the bad reviews and wish I hadn't. The varnish on the lid was gloppy and when you rubbed it, it just flaked off. The seat was in multiple sections and put together unevenly and even had a chip. This company has a huge quality control issue. Thankfully I was able to return it and it is already boxed for return. DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.author: jpd

customer_reviews.title: Toilet seat split after only 3 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: This toilet seat split down the right side after only 3 weeks of use. I got a second one for free from Amazon, and it cracked after only 3 days. These things are junk. I didn't bother to add photos because it looks about the same only on the other side~
customer_reviews.author: KRM

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I had few years ago. Works GREAT. So easy to use & replace. I ordered a new for my current house purchase 3 years ago & it was complicated & a pain to change the paper towels. I had already put in the necessary wood for under cabinet access so the switch was a snap. Love this one (couldn't find it when I ordered the other one). Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Hill

customer_reviews.title: It looks good but...
customer_reviews.text: The sides are not one piece. There are about three pieces of wood glued together for each side. One side was already coming apart when I received it. I don't like when manufacterers glue a bunch of pieces together when they could just use one piece of wood for each side of this holder. The sides are only 3.5 inches wide. That would not require gluing three pieces together to make one narrow board. I could go to Menards and buy one solid oak board and remake the thing. It looks like eventually the glue will fail.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Not comparable to product previously bought from different vendor, would NOT recommend
customer_reviews.text: Item has great visual appeal in the packaging and images on line BUT this soon diminishes as product is used. I had a previous product from a different vendor since 2014 and the hardware was just beginning to show use. Unfortunately at the time that product was no longer available per Amazon listings thus the purchase of this product. I would return if unused but not now. After about a week the brass components began to discolor and pit. Hardware was loose. Also ?? if it was real oak, not the grain pattern I am use to .
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great and was pretty easy to install. The only complaint I had was that one had been sent to me already used, a bit moldy on one end and cracked. It looked sealed like new, so it may have been a switched out return (?) that wasn't noticed. My money on that one was returned pretty quickly so all was okay at the end of the day. On a side note, apparently I can rate "softness" for this. It is wood. I'm not sure what they're looking for. It was smooth...?
customer_reviews.author: B. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: This toilet seat is good for the money.  Just a little light as far as weight.
customer_reviews.text: I always have liked the oak for the toilet seat. This one is okay. It is a little light weight compared to the one I took off. I think Amazon sells one for a little more price but feels more like the weight should be. In other words, the seat is very light weight. Have to be careful and not let it fall. It would not break but would put out a very loud sound. You get what you pay for. I will keep it because it fits well and I can get use it being light.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzylg

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Crappy packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I needed to replace the towel bar in my bathroom. I rent so I wanted to get one that was either similar or identical to the old one, which this one is. It seems sturdy enough like it will hold up well, the only reason I give it 4 stars is because the packaging was very crummy. The bottom was ripped open and the bar fell out the second i took it out of the box. It's dented in a few spots and it overall looks like someone just threw it together last minute.
customer_reviews.author: macy wnuk

customer_reviews.title: Opened package and missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, however when I opened the shipping box, the blister protective cover on the product had been cut open and the mounting hardware missing. I assume the item had been previously returned without the hardware. The missing hardware probably contained Two mounting screws and two wood plugs to cover the screw heads to make the install invisible. I did have hardware screws to mount the product. Other than that I was satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: I've had this toilet seat cover for a little while ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this toilet seat cover for a little while now -- and it appears to be very well made and of heavy wood. It doesn't look or feel cheap! I wondered about some of the reviews that said the seat broke soon after installing it -- mine has not. The price is a little steep, but I do believe you get what you pay for. The Honey Oak color is just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: kalicokarenTop Contributor: Scrapbooking

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! It is extremely sturdy and easy to install. I did install the screws into wood, which definitely helps the sturdiness. The only thing I would recommend is putting the sides about a half inch closer together than the template shows. I do not like when the toilet paper roll can move back and forth side to side more than a little bit, and it looks nicer when you can see less of the white plastic spring loaded piece.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Kenner

customer_reviews.title: Cheap us cheap
customer_reviews.text: I dont like the slim piece of dowel not really a proper bar good enough for price . Havent return it as during covid they are not sending printed labels for mail and our UPS store to use the barcode is 160 mile round trip so that alone inhibits me to make firther orders with Amazon at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Get One Elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: There were several visible flaws: A big blob of varnish, the arm that hold the dowel was crooked and several scratches. Installation would have been easy if the plugs actually fit, but I had to sand quite a bit off so I could get them in and they are still sticking out too much.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Crittenden

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: My husband, who is not handy, was able to install it without problems. Unfortunately the next day, he put the lid down to sit on it for a moment while he was brushing his teeth, and the lid cracked apart. Since he only weighs 150 pounds, I don't think it's unreasonable to expect the lid to handle this much weight.
customer_reviews.author: avid_gardener

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but cheap
customer_reviews.text: Parts not well finished. If there was tool chatter in the milling, there was apparently no step for smoothing. Stain and varnish look like they might not stand up well to wet towels. Screws provided were too small for the drywall anchors provided. Find a stud if you can, otherwise you'll need to get bigger screws.
customer_reviews.author: E.S. Ruete

customer_reviews.title: Use for safety handle in the attic
customer_reviews.text: We have pull down attic stairs and there is nothing to hold onto once you reach the top of the stairs and you are stepping into the attic. My husband mounted this to the attic floor just as you come up the stairs. It's been great for me and I feel so much safer climbing up there. I noticed that my husband now uses it too and our electrician used it when he had to access the attic and thought it was a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: ladyt

customer_reviews.title: Never again.
customer_reviews.text: Love the outside of it. However there is no center dowel for the paper towels, instead there are little one inch nubs. The only reason it got the three stars was because I like the outside. Now I need to do more work for my original purpose (switching out the nubs for a center dowel). If you have an RV skip this one, All of the movement may dislodge the paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Breaker

customer_reviews.title: Great towel rack for the money
customer_reviews.text: I knocked it down one star as the dowel is pretty rough, could snag a towel. I may sand it later to smooth it out some. But for around $10 it is pretty nice. I bought this to out my kitchen towels up higher as my 3 month old kittens were pulling the towels down to the ground trying to climb up them to get on top of the stove. The new towel rack is much higher, and hopefully this stops them from putting my towels on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Serious design flaw
customer_reviews.text: While the frame just fits a paper towel roll with maybe 1/8" clearance, neither of the pegs that retain the roll will retract all the way. So, installing a new roll means muscling past one peg protruding 5/16" which folds and distorts the roll's cardboard center. Otherwise, the appearance is fine, certainly preferable to metal units that eventually rust. The quick fix is to remove the pegs (they just unscrew) and use a 1/2" rod all the way through.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mohr

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with the prompt attention I received from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Update: I'm pleased with the prompt attention I received from Amazon. The first seat split and then broke into three pieces after only a few weeks; I've just expeditiously received a replacement from Amazon and hope this one lasts. I like the overall appearance and serviceability of this product and am a happy customer at this point. I've never had a toilet seat break and there are no inordinately heavy users of this product, therefore, I could only conclude the first seat was defective in some manner.
customer_reviews.author: Kandi

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken not as good as original one several years ago
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased one of these same rings 27 years ago for a towel ring in our bathroom. The ring just broke and I bought another from Amazon The ring arrived in a large shipping box and when I took it out of it's display container I noticed that the wooden ring had a crack through the upper part. Notified Amazon and they refunded my purchase price and did not want it returned to them. Maybe you will have better luck with the new ones then I did, I am NOT going to try again
customer_reviews.author: D. at LLRC

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed. I bought two.
customer_reviews.text: MORE THAN JUST FOR TOWELS!! I sawed off 4.5 inches of one of the bars to meet my needs. It took about minute. I installed the towel bar on the side of one of my dressers to hang my belts on it. Perfect. The other one got attached to the outside of a small armoire where I can easily place pajamas, or my day's clothes (that I might wear again the next day).
customer_reviews.author: Patchouli Cedarwood

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time. We liked the seat for a week and now the wood is separating. Reading the reviews of splitting in half, I now believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Kimack

customer_reviews.title: as the old one was better than the new
customer_reviews.text: item was promptly shipped, but the quality of joinery and finish if the so called oak made the seat unusable. in desperation i ended up taking off the hardware and used it to remount my old oak seat, as the old one was better than the new. the rim of the new seat is pieced like a jigsaw puzzle, with dovetailing uneven and rough, and varnish and stain not going to the edges. awful. also, it came with brass nuts to hold the bolts instead of the finger tighten plastic ones, which i doubt would ever come loose when you need to remove, making changing a toilet seat a major project.
customer_reviews.author: kim culbertson

customer_reviews.title: Seat split at seams 3 months after use
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 seats. 2nd seat seemed to have a very minor defect in the wood seat. Thought it would still work fine. Here 3 months later the seat split at all the seams into 4 pieces while in use. This one seems defective and the return window has closed. I pray the other one doesnt do the same thing!
customer_reviews.author: Proud Grandma

customer_reviews.title: the stubby dowel knobs are spring loaded on each side
customer_reviews.text: I assumed it was a simple dowel you pull out, put the roll on and slip back in. not a deal breaker but a photo would be good. here i fixed that for you
customer_reviews.author: WDT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I know there are no instructions on how to install this toilet seat, so for those of you wondering which way to put the plastic washer on, put the washer on the bottom of the toilet with the flat end facing away from the toilet so that the nut fits nice and snug and the toilet seat won't move. I really love this seat, I'm still a bit weary of sitting on the seat though because of other reviews stating that it broke on them but so far no breaks. Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good solid seat
customer_reviews.text: The seat itself is tongue and groove fitted and four pieces well glued together. The lid is lap fitted and glued, I suspect that the reviewers whose products broke were standing on the lid. The top of the seat is flat, which took a few days to get used to, after years of using curved seats, but fits over the toilet perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Harleyelf

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and looks great. Would have preferred butterfly nuts to attach seat instead of hex nut but still worked as needed. Seems to be of very good quality materials but of course only time can verify that hunch. I would however recommend based on what we have seen so far.
customer_reviews.author: PetsHuman

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I installed in a bathroom that does not require being fashionable so it will serve my purposes. This item would not be a spouse or guest-room visitor pleaser. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: L L

customer_reviews.title: Yellow tint and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It felt a little too cheap and lightweight to rely on (I could picture the bar part cracking with a little pressure from a very potty-eager child), and the color was a little too yellow to match the rest of the bathroom. It was very inexpensive, so I kept it, but I don't really anticipate any toilet paper holder emergencies where it will be needed in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Something to know before buying...
customer_reviews.text: Just FYI, the bar spins. It's not a big deal, but for me, I wish I'd known before I bought it because I'm using it to hang-dry rubber mats (feeding mats for dogs). The rubber mats are heavier than cloth towels (obviously) so unless I hang it completely evenly, the bar will roll the mat to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: EMA

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this toilet seat at first, because it is "solid wood." We installed it 2 days ago, and everything was going fine until this morning, as I was sitting on it doing my business, the seat broke. I have no idea why this happened. I'm an average weighted woman (about 150lb). I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea McCann

customer_reviews.title: It is too early to tell if this solid wood seat will perform any better. I have given this seat only 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this toilet seat to replace a cheaper model that had a veneered surface. It is too early to tell if this solid wood seat will perform any better. I have given this seat only 3 stars, because the lid has black knots in it. The knots may add interest in other places, but black "spots" on anything in the bathroom does not look clean and sanitary. So, even though we will keep this seat, it would have gotten four stars for appearance and maybe even five stars when we determine how it holds up. For now, three stars is the best I can do.
customer_reviews.author: pudgy'smom

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: NOTHING CHEAP LOOKING ABOUT THIS TOILET SEAT. IT LOOKS VERY EXPENSIVE WITH THE GOLD HARDWARE AND IS VERY WELL MADE AND EXTREMELY STURDY. ADD A TASTE OF CLASS TO YOUR BATHROOM. LOVED IT AND THE COLOR IS BEAUTIFUL. BETTER THAN THE PICTURE.
customer_reviews.author: joanie

customer_reviews.title: Well almost.
customer_reviews.text: Nice design. Easy to install. It seems sturdy enough on the seat but lid broke in half in the a week or so. Please dont let your toddler stand on lid to brush teeth or his feet might just get wet.
customer_reviews.author: MrsHDye07

customer_reviews.title: Good addition
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 2nd kitchen in my house. It will easily hold a paper towel roll vertical or horizontal. It does have a slight varnish on it and doesn't exactly match the other wood in my house but exactly what i needed for the price i got it for.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Gentilucci

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Appears to be 100% real wood. My previous one was part wood and part plastic laminate. I did not give it five stars because one side has a slight gap between the pieces and it seems to have adhesive between the parts because tightening the screw does not pull it together.
customer_reviews.author: Russ in Elk Grove

customer_reviews.title: Take a good look before buying.
customer_reviews.text: I thought was going to be a solid wood dowel running the entire length of the holder but instead it has two short pieces of wood on each end that make it difficult to install a roll of paper. I think it will eventually fail due to this construction with springs at each end.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: No continuous rod through towel.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Paper towels fit well BUT there is NOT a continuous rod through the towel roll. There are no pictures showing a rod completely through the paper towel toll, I just assumed there was. I don't like the surprise of the paper towels being pulled off the holder and into the sink that has happened with other towel holders. I don't expect them to pull off from this one but the spring-loaded pegs at each end only engage the towel rolls by about 3/8". Probably enough, but you must rely on them only to keep the roll secured. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: R T

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Only gave 4 stars due to cosmetic issues. The seat has some black smudges under the clear coat so they cannot be cleaned off. Also, the bumpers on the under side of the seat are not pressed on properly. They will eventually break off.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M Gekoski

customer_reviews.title: Spring loaded sides won’t pull back far enough to install a paper towel roll.
customer_reviews.text: Unusable product. If you have three hands and strong gym fingers, maybe you could put a paper towel roll on it. It does not have a dowel all the way through, but two spring loaded knobs at both ends. Both ends have to be pulled at the same time to insert a paper towel roll, and then you would have to use another person to put the towel roll in. The spring loaded sides are too strong and don’t allow you to pull back on them enough to easily install a towel. Because a normal roll extends exacly to both sides with no wiggle room. Completely worthless. Don’t waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Woodings

customer_reviews.title: It looks good and fit my american standard toilet perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted and was not available at any of the local hardware stores. It looks good and fit my american standard toilet perfectly. It was easy for me to install myself without having to call on a son-in-law or neighbor. It's for a guest bathroom so I'm hoping it doesn't drop and break but looks very sturdy and the brass looks good.
customer_reviews.author: emaee

customer_reviews.title: Screw covers don't fit, otherwise amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My only problem is that the screw holes weren't cut just right so I can't use the plugs. I've redone my bathroom with this collection and it upsets me that I can't make this one piece just right. Otherwise it's great! Don't have to worry about paper towels falling out when being pulled like lots of others. A+ on sturdiness!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Could be a bit sturdier
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to match our cabinets and it does that well. However the spring loaded ends that hold the paper towels in place don't compress enough to easily load or remove the paper towels. They also feel as if they will break easily. It comes with one of the spring loaded ends already in place. The second one, must be placed and screwed together. The screw was stripped and barely holds the two pieces together. I would say it's appropriately priced. Would I purchase it again? Probably not.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Walker

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than most
customer_reviews.text: The problem with most toilet seats is that the installation parts are plastic and it's difficult to tighten during installation; I was willing to spend more to finally have a long lasting product. This has brass bolts and it works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Harco

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The two wood pieces don't match. One is an acceptable oak stain, the other looks bleached out. Also, it was missing all the mounting hardware (the screws and wooden plugs that were supposed to be included). I am not happy about having to buy those pieces separately, so I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: mysticwolf

customer_reviews.title: Looks good in my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Very nice towel bar. One star off because of installation issues. Both my husband and I had extreme difficulty with the screw anchors. We now have several holes in our wall due to this and we are not novices. I ended up just using the screws and it holds 3 towels just fine. You will have to use a dab of wood glue to keep the small screw covers in place. I would buy this again and skip the anchors. As long as you don't hang anything super heavy it should be fine. You can see some of the holes in the picture, time to get spackle!
customer_reviews.author: Tee Q

customer_reviews.title: Good but a few flaws
customer_reviews.text: all in all very sturdy, nice looking, and super easy to install. Only design flaws - the corners are not flush, causing the holder to not be able to be flush with the cabinet, leaving a slight gap. could be sanded down, but worth a mention. Other than that still pretty happy for what I paid
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Be aware that this toilet seat is Oak veneer over ...
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this toilet seat is Oak veneer over a pressboard core. My seat cracked within 2 weeks of installation, which I repaired with a metal bracket under the seat and spackling paste. It works very well now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bar
customer_reviews.text: The wooden bar looks fine and works fine. . . the fault is not in our bars but in our installers. Took me longer than it should have to install because i did not measure well when installing it on the back of a bathroom door. Nevertheless, they look just fine. Solid.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: When my order arrived and I went to hang it, I noticed the little wood pieces that hold the dowels for the ring were mounted incredibly crooked. I tried to correct them, but they are glued on. So I ordered a replacement. The replacement arrived quickly, but we just as crooked. I would return it but I needed one right away for my rental Cabin. Will find a better quality piece and put this in my garage. It's junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think I would really like transitioning from a soft cushiony seat back to solid, but I actually like it much better. It’s attractive and very comfortable. The soft seat which was replaced by this one cracked, shifted and discolored in a disappointing short amount of time. I didn’t rate softness as it’s not applicable to this product. Very sturdy and easy to install. No instructions needed!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: A simple thing so badly done.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. The pegs at the end are so short that they don't hold the paper towels in. If I had not mounted this vertically it would have been sent back to Amazon. As it is I might still send it back.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I looked for the cheapest oak paper towel holder I could find, and that's what I got. It arrived cracked and we had to glue it in spots before even hanging it. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: T.T.

customer_reviews.title: not the best seat in the house
customer_reviews.text: installed a month ago and already i had to do hinge repairs. the screws came loose on the hinges and i had to use larger screws for the repair.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley

customer_reviews.title: THE HONEY OAK TOWEL HOLDER LOOKS MAGNIFICENT!!!
customer_reviews.text: INSTALLS IN MINUTES. THE WALL ANCHORS, SCREWS AND PLUGS ARE INCLUDED. THE PLUGS DO NOT SINK FLUSH HOWEVER. IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A FLUSHED PLUGS, THIS TOWEL HOLDER MAY NOT BE THE ONE THAT FITS YOUR APPLICATION. IF YOU PREFER A RAISED PLUG LOOK, THEN THIS HONEY OAK TOWEL HOLDER IS PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood color
customer_reviews.text: Matches my kitchen perfect! Little hard to pull the knobs on sides and put the paper in but i manage. Where the screws go the knob to cover it kept falling out but no one sees it under the cabinet
customer_reviews.author: Sejo

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hand towels and a 30 inch for regular towels. It's the perfect size for two hand towels side by side. Looks great. Sturdy enough but not enough for kids hanging on them or to brace your self getting in and out of the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: After 4 months, it broke!
customer_reviews.text: The part you sit on, with the hole in the middle, was pieced together and not glued (I think.) The pieces began to pull apart, and today, when I sat on it, the side piece fell completely off!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret S. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Seat cracked first week
customer_reviews.text: The seat cracked within a week. I took it off to try to glue it, but then it fell completely apart. I have no intention of returning a used toilet seat, so I just bought a plain plastic one at Ace Hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Carleton

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made & over priced dont Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These good reviews are FAKE ! These wooden towel rings are cheap made from China and and look cheap a terrible. extremely over priced. I willnreturn this to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Like_shopping_Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and bad assemble
customer_reviews.text: The material is super cheap when I put it in the wall it was cricket I try to fixed but it wasn't me it was the way the cut the wood but can't expecting more for the price I pay the little covers for the screws didn't fit in the hole's so yeah o well lesson learn
customer_reviews.author: Viridiana martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice and solid, will match perfect. Good packaging so it came undamaged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rings
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these rings. I renovated my bathroom with a sunset on the beach theme. I wanted to incorporate some wood features but towel bars didn't seam right so in place of one or two bars I mounted 5 wood towel rings on a 1" x 4" board.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Too snug for towel roll
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. The spring ends didn't widen enough to fit full roll of paper towels and the jaws of the main part were too close together to fit roll.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Schommer

customer_reviews.title: The seller was good and sent quick
customer_reviews.text: The seller was good and sent quick, but the product itself was terribly defective. It's NOT a solid piece of wood. It's pieced together. It came apart with minimal weight within just a few days. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jill S. Fortini

customer_reviews.title: Straight forward
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product and easy to install. No frills, just nice wood, easy installation, and straight forward design. The wooden screw caps give it a professional, finished look. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Rae

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the Most Part
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a similar unit that had been in my bathroom for 22 years. The rod on this one was thinner, and it rolls as you take off the towel. At first this seemed odd, but I guess it makes it easier to remove the towel. Don't follow the instructions on where to drill holes--it's not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Best paper towel dispenser you'll ever have!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these 20 years ago that is still going strong, but the dog got a hold of the spring and wooden piece, so I got another one to replace the pieces. Definitely worth the money!

customer_reviews.title: Unique design
customer_reviews.text: Probably my fault so I didn't catch this by the bar doesn't go all the way cross - or even come out - so stuff a paper towel was tough for me. I got another one which is fab! Credit to the engineer team for lowering costs with less materials and will work great for many folks!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Update: even though there’s no dowel rod it works great
customer_reviews.author: Joycie

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Honey oak finish it good but brass looking hinge and attachments plating is very poor. Started pitting and showing surface corrosion in a few weeks. Oak seat and lid is solid and looks good but the plating really brings the rating down.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Eechaute

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy reliable towel holder.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it will be easy to strip and stain to a different color, but it is a lighter oak color. It seems sturdy enough for everyday use and should be easy to install. We haven't actually installed ours yet as we want to try and stain it to a dark walnut finish to match our cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: David Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The right place for your dish towels
customer_reviews.text: Finally! Got the dish towels off the counter, and off the door knobs they keep falling off of. And a perfect match for the light oak cabinet doors.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Essary

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for springs to loosen
customer_reviews.text: Pros: We had a choice of vertical or horizontal installation, we chose vertical, installation was easy. Perfect color. Cons: Difficult placing paper towel roll as the springs don't pull back far enough, we had to bend the paper roll slightly to get it on the holder. Supplier listed price $4.44 cheaper than I paid just the day before. Update: Amazon gave a credit for the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for an older towel rod. I needed something in oak finish that would closely match the existing towel rods in the bathroom. It was easy to install and looks nice on the wall. The color matches the other oak ones. I gave it 4 stars because it does not seem quite as sturdy as my old one and I felt the need to reinforce it with wood glue.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie E Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Three of the four crew holes in top of lid were stripped and one of the screws themselves were missing upon fisher examination. Glad I didn’t order it to be used, only as a canvas. Still disappointed that I’ll have to find other means of connecting the two securely.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Fiedler

customer_reviews.title: They were a perfect match to the one from Home Depot and installed ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these at Home Depot and needed two longer ones. Home Depot didn't carry any of these longer than 24". I needed two that were 26". So, I purchased two 30" towel bars and cut them to fit. They were a perfect match to the one from Home Depot and installed just as easily. They appear to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Married and happy

customer_reviews.title: These are okay anyway
customer_reviews.text: I like the wood grain but they are so very light not sturdy at all. I will stick to the metal ones. It looks good with my wood grain cabinets
customer_reviews.author: Sussi

customer_reviews.title: This is rustic and uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The ridge just inside the opening to the toilet is pointed and digs into your legs. rather than return it I chose to sand it down to my liking and then put a coat of polyurethane on the sanded area. I'm happy now but I expected more for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Woman

customer_reviews.title: The finish was very poor and rough
customer_reviews.text: The seat broke a few days after installation. The finish was very poor and rough. I decided to return it and get a replacement. The replacement is ok but still is not good quality. I'm keeping it because it's been a hassle just finding one that I like.
customer_reviews.author: Dara Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is the wood plugs that fit over the screw heads.
customer_reviews.text: It works like it should. My only complaint is the wood plugs that fit over the screw heads. They are all different colors. It looks like 2 don't even have a coating on them. Also 2 plugs fit snug but the other 2 are so loose that the plugs fall out. At least it's solid wood.
customer_reviews.author: AnAviatrix

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the one we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace the towel bar in one of the bathrooms that has been broke for awhile and this was the exact one that was in there. We were excited to find the same one at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: kristy morris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, basic item used for my cabin bathtoom. It's good quality However, the top mounting screw is directly behind the hook, so it makes it tricky to tighten into place.
customer_reviews.author: Ardent Grant

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Lid broke after a week, screws ripped right out of particle board or whatever it's made of. Removed lid and using until 8 can get a decent sturdy one. Pretty though.
customer_reviews.author: valicia

customer_reviews.title: Good- dont use the included mounting hardware
customer_reviews.text: Mounting hardware included was cheap and not usable so had to spend more to get sturdy wall mounts- overall good product
customer_reviews.author: MarkS

customer_reviews.title: nice but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: nice product, plastic piece on bottom, one of 5 pieces, not attached properly. So quality control is not perfect. I would buy again if needed because overall the product is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Meadowsdad

customer_reviews.title: This seat works great, and looks super
customer_reviews.text: This seat works great, and looks super, but I had to go to the hardware store to get different washer heads. The ones that were supplied were too small and were metal. I didn't want the metal to be in direct contact with the porcelain; but even so the bolt heads were too small and slipped right through the holes in the toilet. This product would have been perfect if proper hardware would have been supplied.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The inner tube that attaches the two ends is too short. Have fixed it twice so far. Also the inner rim of the seat is a little sharp, not beveled very well.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda B

customer_reviews.title: No no no
customer_reviews.text: This came with space between the hinges so the the seat moves around. Very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked the second time it was used - horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviews state, this is terrible quality, completely cracked the second time it was used. Luckily returnable since it was just bought! Cannot recommend this toilet seat!
customer_reviews.author: charliebarley

customer_reviews.title: Has imperfections.
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a warped towel rod. Also one of the ears that holds the rod is bent to one side (not perpendicular). Nothing major, but should have better quality control. The package also is a template for the screw holes. Mine came with 4 anchors and 4 screws.
customer_reviews.author: AnAviatrix

customer_reviews.title: Good looking
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheap but it does the job, towel bar is not stationary it rolls, you have to glue it or put a screw in it to stop it from rolling. For the price it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Internet Bob

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look on this, fits in with my kitchen theme well. Only criticism is that the roll spins very freely and whenever you grab a sheet one-handed and try to tear it off you get extra spin on the whole roll and have to rewind it up. I am going to try to create some sort of tensioner on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Design House 561217 Dalton Double Robe Hook, Wood Construction, Honey Oak Finish, One Size
product_meta.description:
Style:Double Robe Hook| Size:One SizeThe Design House 561217 Dalton Double Robe Hook adds a relaxed country style to your bathroom. This robe hook is made of stunning honey oak wood, with smooth lines and a traditional design. Measuring 6. 5-inches high, this hook adds a warm and comforting aesthetic to any bathroom. The dual construction is ideal for small and large robes. Install one or a line of hooks for the whole family to use. A standard mount and exposed screws are included for easy installation. The Dalton Collection features a matching towel ring, toilet seat, towel bar and toilet paper holder for a complete bathroom set to enjoy for years to come. The Design House 561217 Dalton Double Robe Hook comes with a 1-year limited that protects against defects in materials and workmanship.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Design House 561217 Dalton Double Robe Hook adds a relaxed country style to your bathroom. This robe hook is made of stunning honey oak wood, with smooth lines and a traditional design. Measuring 6.5-inches high, this hook adds a warm and comforting aesthetic to any bathroom. The dual construction is ideal for small and large robes. Install one or a line of hooks for the whole family to use. A standard mount and exposed screws are included for easy installation. The Dalton Collection features a matching towel ring, toilet seat, towel bar and toilet paper holder for a complete bathroom set to enjoy for years to come. The Design House 561217 Dalton Double Robe Hook comes with a 1-year limited warranty that protects against defects in materials and workmanship. Design House offers products in multiple home decor categories including lighting, ceiling fans, hardware and plumbing products. With years of hands-on experience, Design House understands every aspect of the home decor industry, and devotes itself to providing quality products across the home decor spectrum. Providing value to their customers, Design House uses industry leading merchandising solutions and innovative programs. Design House is committed to providing high quality products for your home improvement projects.

Adds a relaxed country style to your bathroom
